examples: no one dared say a word
she dare not let herself love

definition: to challenge to perform an action especially as a proof of courage

examples: dared the anger of his family

definition: to have the courage to contend against, venture, or try
examples: the actress dared a new interpretation of the classic role

definition: an act or instance of daring (see dare entry 1 sense 1) : challenge
examples: crossed the river on a dare

definition: Virginia 1587–? 1st child born in America of English parents
